word:
Copenhagen, Wednesday, October 14, 1885--It is foggy this morning, but think it will clear away. Last night I spoke in the hall to all that it would seat. They listened with interest. My text was Psalm 16:8, 9. I had much freedom in speaking.--Ms 25, 1885, pp. 3, 5-9. ("First Visit to Denmark," diary, October 6-14, 1885.) 

Released May 11, 1972
